de.weltraumschaf.juberblog.template

Class Layout

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.weltraumschaf.juberblog.template.Template
      • de.weltraumschaf.juberblog.template.Layout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Assignable, Renderable

    public final class Layout
extends Template
    Extends the template to provide a two step layout. Provides base variables such as title, encoding etc to the layout and inner content template.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  Layout.DefaultContent
      Used as a default template which does only contains a string.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Renderable content
      Inner template to render content string.
      private static List<VarName> GLOBAL_VARIABLE_NAMES
      All these variables are assigned to content if it is type of Template.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Layout(freemarker.template.Configuration templateConfiguration, String layoutTemplateFile)
      Initializes all provided template variables with empty strings as default.

    • Method Summary
